review: I simply had no need for this product since I have a gaming system and computer both connected to my TV as is. Purchased it out of curiosity but my Raspberry Pi loads much faster and never buffers on local content. The Chromecast seemed to work fine for Netflix and YouTube but even then, the Xbox360 would buffer faster.

review: There are many other devices for streaming content off the net, and all of them have the same problem: a awkward remote that makes finding anything impossible.Chromecast solves the problem: you find videos on your phone, your laptop, or your tablets and then send them up on the screen. If you have an android phone, controls are always available with a touch from the notification menu.
